en_ZW {
    Version { "2.0" }
    NumberPatterns {
        "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
        "\u00a4#,##0.00;-\u00a4#,##0.00",
        "#,##0%",
        "#E0",
    }
    Currencies{
        ZWD { "Z$",  "Zimbabwean Dollar"      } // 04/18/1980- Zimbabwean Dollar
        USD { "US$",     "USD" } // US Dollar
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                "h:mm:ss a",
                "h:mm:ss a",
                "h:mm:ss a",
                "h:mm a",
                "EEEE dd MMMM yyyy",
                "dd MMMM yyyy",
                "dd MMM,yy",
                "d/M/yyyy",
                "{1} {0}",
            }
        }
    }
}
